lead_paragraph: Doug Quinn, whom a Hudson Malone regular called the best bartender in New York, opened the bar after he was abruptly fired by P.J. Clarke’s.

headline.print_headline: The Revenge Pub on East 53rd Street
headline.main: The Revenge Pub on East 53rd Street

snippet: Doug Quinn, whom a Hudson Malone regular called the best bartender in New York, opened the bar after he was abruptly fired by P.J. Clarke’s.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Hudson Malone, pub in Turtle Bay neighborhood of Manhattan known for its New York comfort food, turn-of-the-century decor and bow-tied owner-bartender Doug Quinn.
